b.ph: Generating the Authentication token in JIRA

titlealts.navtitle: Task perfomed by the System Admistrator
titlealts.searchtitle: Task performed to enable Remote Diagnostics support using VNC server.

task.shortdesc: This topic gives the information about how to generate API Token in JIRA.

context.p: To create the API auth token in JIRA, do the following steps:

step.cmd: API Token is used to integrate JIRA with the external system (ICD).
Click on Profile icon on the top right corner in the menu bar, then select the API token Authentication option.
Create new tokens for your connections by clicking on the New API Token button.
A message box prompts you to provide the information about description, expiration and scope of the token, then click on API token.
Keep a copy of the token with you. API Tokens can be used to authenticate to the JIRA instead of your user password in ICD.
